title: EU's Energy Plan
itunes:title: EU's Energy Plan
description:
Windfall taxes, price caps on renewable and nuclear power, and reducing demand: the European Commission has laid out its plans for tackling the energy crunch this winter. Our European Correspondent Maria Tadeo joins Stephen Carroll and Yuan Potts with the details of what Ursula von der Leyen announced in her State of the Union speech. Also today: Jon Restell, CEO of the Managers in Partnership Union, tells us about the challenges facing the NHS as his members prepare to ballot on industrial action next month.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
